fields.name: Kentucky Bluegrass
fields.mowing: {"spring-first":{"title":"First mow of spring as soon as the grass begins to grow","height":2.5,"description":"Clean out dead grass and leaves, and stimulate growth"},"spring":{"title":"Spring","height":3,"description":"Better to have more leaf surface to grab more sunlight during these shorter days"},"summer":{"title":"Summer","height":3.5,"description":"Longer grass blades shade the root system during summer heat"},"fall":{"title":"Fall","height":3,"description":"This will stimulate more root growth"},"fall-last":{"title":"Last mow of fall, just before or just after the first frost","height":2.5,"description":"Shorter lawn over winter will cut down on winter kill"}}
